about_the_game:
Enter the world of Phrank's Photon Pharm and discover the wonders of Underland. Solve puzzles as you work to to unmask the evil that threatens Underland's denizens. Use a wide variety of devices to manipulate the photons that are the lifeblood of Underland. Change the photon's color, direction, and even duplicate it to manipulate the world around you and save the day.

Phrank’s Photon Pharm is set in Underland, a world of caverns beneath ours with a steampunk aesthetic. This demo introduces you to Phrank, who will teach you about some of the mechanics of Phrank's Photon Pharm and test your skills through ten levels.
